Jargon Term: Your condition improved and you did not require as much oxygen at time of transfer.
The following changes were made to your medications: STOP oral furosemide
START IV furosemide and adjust dose as needed
START miconazole powder as needed for rash under R breast
START albuterol nebs, both every four hours and as needed every six hours

Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Other

Jargon Term: Please maintain a low salt diet
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Diet

Jargon Term: Weigh yourself every day and call your doctor if your weight goes up by 3 pounds or more.
